name: MakingCosmetics - Lactobacillus Ferment Natural Preservative
description: MakingCosmetics offers Lactobacillus Ferment as a natural anti-microbial agent with broad-spectrum preservation from lactic acid bacteria family. This microbiome-friendly preservative provides product protection while supporting skin's natural flora, representing the paradigm shift from 'kill all bacteria' to selective preservation.
notes: Natural antimicrobial from lactic acid bacteria family. Provides broad-spectrum preservation while being microbiome-friendly. MakingCosmetics specializes in small quantities ideal for R&D and small-batch production. Represents next-generation preservation approach.
